articles.author: Amelia Lucas
articles.title: PepsiCo earnings beat estimates, but demand for drinks and snacks drops in North America - CNBC
articles.description: PepsiCo's earnings topped Wall Street's estimates, but the company's revenue missed expectations, as drink and snack demand fell in North America.
articles.content:
PepsiCo reported mixed quarterly results on Tuesday as demand for its snacks and drinks fell in North America for the fifth straight quarter.
Shares of the company dropped more than 2% in premarket … [+2332 chars]
